description: Primes p such that Ramanujan function tau(p) is divisible by 13.
references: R. Rankin, Ramanujan's tau-function and its generalizations, pp. 245-268 of Ramanujan Revisited, Academic Press.
prog: (Perl) use ntheory ":all"; forprimes { say unless ramanujan_tau($_) % 13; } 1e4; # _Dana Jacobsen_, Sep 05 2015
author: Paolo Dominici (pl.dm(AT)libero.it)
